long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Local QrCoding is a pure Chrome extension to generate QRcode for the url of the current tab.

To install it, just download from the Chrome webstore.

It is very easy to use, if you want a QR code for the url of the current page, just click the icon of this plugin, and a QR code comes, that's it!
